issue.title: [C++] Update vcpkg.json builtin-baseline
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14166](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14166). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
`google-cloud-cpp` was a monolithic package in `vcpkg` until 2021-08-31.  To support GCS I need to add this package to the `cpp/vcpkg.json` file.  I also want to take advantage of features to keep the build times under control.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14166?focusedCommentId=17435111) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 11266
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11266>
